name: william stoner
text: Recent experiences have been outstanding! Pizza has been hot and very fresh. I have been hooked on the large, pepperoni, Italian sausage, and red onion pan pizza. I'm not sure when or what has changed, but keep up the great work. The delivery team has been very friendly!
